website_summaries.verdict: If you need a pull-out bed for guests, this model's convenient features make it a good choice.
pros: Stands out for its multi-functional design
Pull-out bed and chaise with storage space
cons: Fabric has a tendency to snag
Seating is too firm for some individuals

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this couch!!!! I hunted forever to find just the right couch, and I am so glad that I picked this one! It is made by a really good company. I bought a chair from them and I had it over a year or two and it's held up really well. This couch is a little firm but that just means it's going to last forever . It's still really comfortable. I love the pullout bed And I love that I now have a ton of room for storage under the chaise lounge (bigger than it looks). This is a great couch.
customer_reviews.author: Cline

customer_reviews.title: Love the couch/not the color
customer_reviews.text: Quality not the very best but comfortable enough. Good design, excellent size, very versatile, BUT was not even close to the color I was expecting! It said charcoal (so I could match it with a navy chair) but it turned out to be Olive Green! With specs of black. Only the throw-pillows had SOME grey on one side, but not much.
customer_reviews.author: Tani

customer_reviews.title: Good size! Simple to put the two pieces together
customer_reviews.text: Good size! Simple to put the two pieces together. Comfortable to lay on for sleeping. Could use an extra foam pad to make is a little softer to sleep on. We have fun with the "bed" part out so that we (3 adult sized peeps) all have a chaise lounge to sit on with plenty of room between us while we watch movies together. The dog has room to climb on too. Pass the popcorn!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A

customer_reviews.title: New center piece for my home
customer_reviews.text: Super cozy, easy to assemble - make sure your delivery is in-home not curbside if you don't have people who can move it in. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love my new couch. I have had it about a month now and wish I had found it earlier before I had already bought my other couch. I have slept on it every night and although on the firm side I am not uncomfortable at all. Very pretty color too. It arrived early which I was happy with since I was so excited to get it. So convenient to open and have an extra place to sleep. Very easy to put together too. Took a total of about 15 minutes. Don't hesitate if your on the fence about this one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Lobaito

customer_reviews.title: Horrible quality.....very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The design is nice but this is not comfortable at all. The fabric started fraying less than 6 months of having this sofa. Horrible quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I expected and they carried the couch ...
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I expected and they carried the couch boxes up the stairs and into our apartment, which wasn't expected. The couch is a great charcoal color and comfortable. Definitely on the firm side, but to me that means it won't sag as fast.
customer_reviews.author: Jklopp

customer_reviews.title: Great for me!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, perfect for my needs. It fits great and I rarely use the pull-out section. The color and material is as I expected. Great product for the price for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anisoara Romanson

customer_reviews.title: Measurements are wrong
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this couch... Researched and talked to a few venders as well as customers to ensure that the couch is indeed 90" long since on several websites had different several different measurements. It arrived late, and on the box it clearly says 99" long. I do not have 99" for a couch. I'm extremely disappointed, and had to remove an arm to make it fit. Also not true to color, it's more of a dark grey... Otherwise, we do love the functions and comfort of the couch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rekun

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sofa bed! Clean modern lines and extremely comfortable as a sofa and as a bed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sofa. A bit stiff. But bed is really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Vulgamott

product_meta.title: Gus Sectional Sofa with Pull Out Bed Charcoal
product_meta.description: Beautifully designed and exceptionally versatile, this sectional is a solid choice for any space. Easy elegance shines through in a classic build with plush seats and back cushions. Track arms add a linear look that balances its silhouette to cover transitional design schemes. Lovely charcoal upholstery influences a more updated look, while traditional styling including tufted back cushions and included accent pillows deliver a polished look. A hidden pull-out bed transforms this comfortable seating venue into a restful sleep space that also includes room for storage in the chaise end.
feature_bullets: Seat width for each cushion is 28"
Type of back seat construction: Webbing base and foam
